Port the JSONP binding from 2.x to 1.x to help with this conversation http://www.mail-archive.com/dev@tuscany.apache.org/msg13393.html. It's not in the build yet but works in my environment. Hoping that Fabiano will check that it works in his environment.
As per previous commit comment I didn't mean to include these in the build just yet

Add a port of the 2.x version of the JSON databinding. This works with the JSONP binding. If I apply the 2.x changes to the existing JSON databinding the I can get the JSONP binding to work but it messes up other bindings, e.g. JSONRPC, which rely on it. These other bindings have been changed for 2.x also. Not in build yet.
